pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fetch Climate Data from Environment Canada // The Environment Canada climate archives http://climate.weather.gc.ca/ are an important source of data for climate researchers in Canada and world wide. The repository contains temperature, precipitation, and wind data for more than 8,000 locations. The functions in this package simplify the process of downloading, subsetting, and manipulating these data for the purposes of more efficient workflows in climate research.
